acSonetTraps.name: acSonetTraps
acSonetTraps.description: The MIB module to describe SONET/SDH Traps.

acSonetPortFacilityLoopbackActiveTrap.name: acSonetPortFacilityLoopbackActiveTrap
acSonetPortFacilityLoopbackActiveTrap.description: The SONET physical interface has entered a loopback mode where the received optical data is sent out the optical transmitter.

acSonetPortFacilityLoopbackClearTrap.name: acSonetPortFacilityLoopbackClearTrap
acSonetPortFacilityLoopbackClearTrap.description: The SONET physical interface has disabled a loopback mode and is now transmitting and receiving optical data normally.

acSonetPortSectionDCCFailureAlarmTrap.name: acSonetPortSectionDCCFailureAlarmTrap
acSonetPortSectionDCCFailureAlarmTrap.description: Section DCC for this SONET port has failed.

acSonetPortSectionDCCFailureClearTrap.name: acSonetPortSectionDCCFailureClearTrap
acSonetPortSectionDCCFailureClearTrap.description: Section DCC for this SONET port has recovered.

acSonetPortLineDCCFailureAlarmTrap.name: acSonetPortLineDCCFailureAlarmTrap
acSonetPortLineDCCFailureAlarmTrap.description: Line DCC for this SONET port has failed.

acSonetPortLineDCCFailureClearTrap.name: acSonetPortLineDCCFailureClearTrap
acSonetPortLineDCCFailureClearTrap.description: Line DCC for this SONET port has recovered.

acSonetPortAppianDCCFailureAlarmTrap.name: acSonetPortAppianDCCFailureAlarmTrap
acSonetPortAppianDCCFailureAlarmTrap.description: Appian DCC for this SONET port has failed.

acSonetPortAppianDCCFailureClearTrap.name: acSonetPortAppianDCCFailureClearTrap
acSonetPortAppianDCCFailureClearTrap.description: Appian DCC for this SONET port has recovered.

acSonetSectionLOFAlarmTrap.name: acSonetSectionLOFAlarmTrap
acSonetSectionLOFAlarmTrap.description: Loss of frame failure at section level.

acSonetSectionLOFClearTrap.name: acSonetSectionLOFClearTrap
acSonetSectionLOFClearTrap.description: Loss of frame at section level recovered.

acSonetSectionTraceAlarmTrap.name: acSonetSectionTraceAlarmTrap
acSonetSectionTraceAlarmTrap.description: The section trace identifier received for the SONET interface was unexpected.

acSonetSectionTraceClearTrap.name: acSonetSectionTraceClearTrap
acSonetSectionTraceClearTrap.description: The section trace identifier mismatch condition for the SONET interface has recovered.

acSonetSection15MinuteESAlarmTrap.name: acSonetSection15MinuteESAlarmTrap
acSonetSection15MinuteESAlarmTrap.description: Errored seconds for the section have exceeded the threshold for the current 15 minute interval.

acSonetSection15MinuteESClearTrap.name: acSonetSection15MinuteESClearTrap
acSonetSection15MinuteESClearTrap.description: Errored seconds for the section have recovered for the current 15 minute interval.

acSonetSection15MinuteSESAlarmTrap.name: acSonetSection15MinuteSESAlarmTrap
acSonetSection15MinuteSESAlarmTrap.description: Severly errored seconds for the section have exceeded the threshold for the current 15 minute interval.

acSonetSection15MinuteSESClearTrap.name: acSonetSection15MinuteSESClearTrap
acSonetSection15MinuteSESClearTrap.description: Severely errored seconds for the section have recovered for the current 15 minute interval.

acSonetSection15MinuteSEFAlarmTrap.name: acSonetSection15MinuteSEFAlarmTrap
acSonetSection15MinuteSEFAlarmTrap.description: Severely errored frames for the section have exceeded the threshold for the current 15 minute interval.

acSonetSection15MinuteSEFClearTrap.name: acSonetSection15MinuteSEFClearTrap
acSonetSection15MinuteSEFClearTrap.description: Severely errored frames for the section have recovered for the current 15 minute interval.

acSonetSection15MinuteCVAlarmTrap.name: acSonetSection15MinuteCVAlarmTrap
acSonetSection15MinuteCVAlarmTrap.description: Coding violations, or BIP errors, for the section have exceeded the threshold for the current 15 minute interval.

acSonetSection15MinuteCVClearTrap.name: acSonetSection15MinuteCVClearTrap
acSonetSection15MinuteCVClearTrap.description: Coding violations, or BIP errors, for the section have recovered for the current 15 minute interval.

acSonetSectionDayESAlarmTrap.name: acSonetSectionDayESAlarmTrap
acSonetSectionDayESAlarmTrap.description: Errored seconds for the section have exceeded the threshold for the current day interval.

acSonetSectionDayESClearTrap.name: acSonetSectionDayESClearTrap
acSonetSectionDayESClearTrap.description: Errored seconds for the section have recovered for the current day interval.

acSonetSectionDaySESAlarmTrap.name: acSonetSectionDaySESAlarmTrap
acSonetSectionDaySESAlarmTrap.description: Severely errored seconds for the section have exceeded the threshold for the current day interval.

acSonetSectionDaySESClearTrap.name: acSonetSectionDaySESClearTrap
acSonetSectionDaySESClearTrap.description: Severely errored seconds for the section have recovered for the current day interval.

acSonetSectionDaySEFAlarmTrap.name: acSonetSectionDaySEFAlarmTrap
acSonetSectionDaySEFAlarmTrap.description: Severely errored frames for the section have exceeded the threshold for the current day interval.

acSonetSectionDaySEFClearTrap.name: acSonetSectionDaySEFClearTrap

acSonetPathLOPClearTrap.name: acSonetPathLOPClearTrap

acSonetPathTraceClearTrap.name: acSonetPathTraceClearTrap

acSonetPathSDClearTrap.name: acSonetPathSDClearTrap

acSonetPath15MinuteUASClearTrap.name: acSonetPath15MinuteUASClearTrap
